extendedInfo.description: ***PLEASE READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW THE DESCRIPTION***Welcome to my Carbon Glass Theme. It is a mix of Carbon Fiber, my Glass Rings and Glass Squares themes and icons. The goal is to be a very unique, clean styled theme with a perfect mixture of the Glass Squares and Glass Rings to keep you intrigued.The theme was originally built for ICS but I have been adding more and more of the JB objects as the theme goes. I currently am still running ICS so testing changes is slightly difficult. What's Themed:    Framework and the associated icons    System UI    Settings    LatinIME (keyboard)    System Apps     Market Apps - GMail,(G+ in coming update), Plume, YouTubeMore apps will continue to be added, as well as adding more into the currently themed apps.*********INSTRUCTIONS***********THIS IS FOR ROOTED PHONES ONLY.....xHDPI & HDPI ONLYDo not ask me how to root your phone, I will not tell you.Install, Apply in Themes Setting, Reboot. If you get an error message saying the theme was not compiled correctly perform the following:    Apply System Theme    Reboot    Apply Carbon Glass    Reboot (to complete Theme instantiation)If the wallpaper does not change (very common), just reapply the theme and it will. No reboot is required after that step.*REBOOT AFTER APPLYING TO MAKE SURE EVERYTHING GETS APPLIED...even after updates**DO NOT MOVE TO SDCARD....WILL CAUSE ERRORS*If you have no idea what that means then PLEASE DON'T DOWNLOAD!Feel free to email questions.Thank You's:    T-Mobile for the Theme Engine    CM/AOKP/BAMF teams for adding it to their ROMs    Scar45 for the Nav Bar and JB help, and his PCB theme for providing some ideas    NMiltner for the JB help    DJDarkKnight96 for helping me with the Theme Engine

reviews.title: Flawless, very Fantastic looking Theme
reviews.comment: This theme is very smooth looking and operating, fantastic design for those who are looking for a clean modern theme. The Author is great at responding to e mails and working at resolving any issues I highly recommend any product from this Author.
reviews.author: Ronald Griffis

reviews.title: Its good. Not great but good.
reviews.comment: Wish it was a bit more complete. For example I\'m on paranoid android and would like to have seen it fully theme the tablet version of gmail.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice, but missing some buttons.
reviews.comment: I would love to use this but one of my system buttons I use is Notifications. It is the only one I\'ve seen so far that stays as stock the theme. Hopefully this can get added.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply incredible......
reviews.comment: I do wish some of the icons were themed in the same style, but the parts that are themed are nothing short of breathtaking.  Two gigantic Mickey Mouse sized thumbs up!!!!
reviews.author: Glen Ross

reviews.title: Best Theme Ever!!!
reviews.comment: I don\'t normally rate apps and I almost never ever pay for them but this 1 is great, well worth the money...  Keep up the good work and I\'m looking forward to more updates...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best theme for CM10
reviews.comment: I normally don\'t vote it pay for apps, but this is well worth the money, great job! Now if only we voted get you to theme the icons ;-)  Looks great on my skyrocket!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: A master has done it again. this is a beautiful these and is marvelous.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome theme
reviews.comment: Looks wonderful! Look forward to more!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Greatness!
reviews.comment: Great theme by a talented themer!
reviews.author: A Google User
